"Backpack with built-in AI assistant": A backpack with a built-in AI assistant that can help you organize your life. The assistant can keep track of your schedule, remind you of important events, suggest activities based on your interests, and even help you find the best deals on products you need.

"Backpack with solar panels": A backpack with solar panels built into the sides or top. This would allow you to charge your phone or other electronic devices on the go, without needing to bring a portable charger.

"Backpack with a built-in water filtration system": A backpack with a built-in water filtration system that can filter out harmful bacteria and viruses from any source of water. This would be especially useful for backpackers who need to stay hydrated in remote areas with limited access to clean drinking water.

"Backpack with a built-in GPS tracker": A backpack with a built-in GPS tracker that can track your location and help you navigate. This would be especially useful for hikers or other outdoor enthusiasts who need to stay on track and avoid getting lost.

"Backpack with a built-in charging pad": A backpack with a built-in charging pad that can charge your phone, tablet, or other electronic devices without the need for wires. This would be especially useful for people who are always on the go and need to stay connected to their devices.
